titleStmt.title: The prophetie of the spirit of loue. Set-fourth by HN: and by him perused a-new, and more distinctlie declared. Translated out of Base-almayne into English
titleStmt.author: Niclaes, Hendrik, 1502?-1580?
Vitell, Christopher, fl. 1555-1579.
